text: Priscilla Marie Pointer (May 18, 1924 - April 28, 2025) was an American actress.Priscilla Pointer Biography (1924-) She began her career in the theater. Her daughter was actress Amy Irving. She was known for her roles in Carrie, The Onion Field, Mommie Dearest, Twilight Zone: The Movie, A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors, Blue Velvet and Coyote Moon. Pointer died at an assisted living facility in Ridgefield, Connecticut, on April 28, 2025, at the age of 100. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1924 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:2025 deaths Category:American centenarians
title: Priscilla Pointer
